mean_cn: n.（宗教，种族、政治等的）偏执者，盲信者
mean_en: a person who hates or refuses to accept the members of a particular group (such as a racial or religious group)
sentence: A bigot is one who has a prejudice against people from different races.
sentence_trans: 种族偏执者指的是对其他种族人群带有偏见的一类人。
word_etyma: big，bigod\u003dby，god的变体 ＋ ot表示人 → bigot顽固而心胸狭窄的人
